MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  SY4 postcode area of Shrewsbury, affecting properties in Baschurch and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:02PM. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team are on their way to site to investigate and repair the fault Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 8:15PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:10PM on 13th November 2020.
